name: Vor'S Prize
description:
MY QUEENS -
You were right, the Tenno threat is real. We found one drifting near Pluto but the Lotus knew we were coming. She purged the Cryo moments before we had them and sent a squad of Tenno to break our assault.
They escaped. We are working on tracing them. Separate this Tenno from the flock and it should be easy to kill. We shattered its Warframe and expect such an abrupt Cryo purge will have damaged its memories.
We anxiously await punishment for failing this task.
- VOR

patchlogs.name: Oberon Prime: Hotfix 20.7.1
patchlogs.changes: The Health Conversion Mod now activates upon taking damage instead of getting hit. Previously, Warframes (like Valkyr, Rhino or Nezha) that have abilities that make themselves invincible to damage, were consuming the conversion when hit even though no damage was being done due to invincibility. This rendered the Health Conversion Mod rather useless, and has since been changed to improve functionality.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.4.12: Saryn Prime
patchlogs.changes: Infested Sorties will no longer generate Hijack Sortie Missions because their tiny baby claws are too small to reach the core.Convergence will always spawn moving towards an objective to help reduce unnecessary backtracking.Gravity has been disabled for Convergence pickups, keeping their appearance predictable..Steel Meridian’s General Sacrifice has been changed from Rhino Prime Helmet to Trinity Prime Helmet.The Rift and its interaction with hacking terminals has now been consistently applied to be not-hackable. You may have noticed the inconsistency in Rifted targets ability to interact with hacking panels. While his Rift-based skillset does offer some unique opportunities for players one major issue discussed within the community has been determining what are the 'rules' Limbo's Riftwalking follows. Keeping this in mind players can expect future updates to contain adjustments to Limbo, enemies, and interactable elements of the environment, to help make playing Limbo a more consistent experience.  We will continue to monitor Limbo's unique interactive mechanic and its effect on gameplay, and will let you know should any other changes be necessary. Stay tuned for a Dev Workshop!

patchlogs.name: Specters of the Rail: U2.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Archwing Impact, Slash, and Puncture Mods giving incorrect bonuses to stats. They were giving flat bonus rather than percentages as intended by the precedent set by all other physical damage mods  (Comet Blast, Quasar Drill, Zodiac Shred, Meteor Crash, Nebula Bore, and Astral Slash are all +90%).

name: Secura Lecta
description: Whip the enemy out of their ill-gotten gains; double credit drops on kills.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Update 19.8.0
patchlogs.changes: The Credit Boost function for the Secura Lecta has changed. Before, you could get on average 11.6x Credits from kills. This chance has changed and now scales with Mastery Rank. At Mastery Rank 8, you'll get on average 2x Credits from kills. This increase continues with your Mastery Rank. At Mastery Rank 18 you'll get on average 4x Credits from kills (capped). No other changes were made regarding synergies (i.e Chroma's Effigy, etc) - only the weapon's Credit boosting functionality has been touched.

name: Ash Prime
description: Distraction and subterfuge become lethal weapons with Ash Prime. Featuring altered mod polarities for greater customization.

abilities.name: Blade Storm

name: Banshee Prime
description: Banshee Prime assails her foes by manipulating sonic forces to deadly effect. Featuring altered mod polarities for greater customization.

abilities.name: Silence
abilities.description: Using Silence surrounds Banshee in an aura that stuns enemies and will limit their perceptions and tactical response to gunfire and Warframe attacks.

abilities.name: Sonar
abilities.description: Using acoustic location, Banshee's Sonar power finds and tracks enemies, and exposes critical weak spots to everyone in your squad.

abilities.name: Sonic Boom
abilities.description: Banshee emits a sonic shockwave that pushes targets in range with enough force to incapacitate or kill attackers.

abilities.name: Sound Quake
abilities.description: Channeling all of her acoustic energy into the environment, Banshee uses ultrasonic reverberations to violently shake the ground.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Hotfix 22.17.4
patchlogs.changes: Kuva Guardians will now play their disarming animation properly, instead of having their Twin Rogga’s magically pop into their hands.We’Re Working On A Script To Give The Respective Shoulder Armor To Those Who Purchased The Tennogen Skin. We Will Update You Here When It Is Running/Complete. Script Has Been Run And Has Completed! Please Relog If You Purchased The Banshee Sonority Skin Pre-Hotfix.:

name: Ember Prime
description: Ember Prime offers the same potential for wanton destruction as Ember but provides unique mod polarities, allowing for greater customization.

abilities.name: Accelerant
abilities.description: Stun nearby enemies with strong accelerant. Increases all fire damage dealt.

abilities.name: Fire Blast
abilities.description: Slam the ground to create a wave of plasma that incinerates nearby enemies and forms a persistent ring of fire. Add heat damage to weapons by firing them through the ring.

abilities.name: Fireball
abilities.description: Charge and release a fiery projectile that ignites enemies on contact and leaves behind a treacherous patch of flame.

abilities.name: World On Fire
abilities.description: Blast nearby foes with a burst of fire, and follow that up with a barrage of fireballs against any enemy who dares approach. Over time, these fireballs burn hotter as they consume more energy.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Hotfix 22.13.3
patchlogs.changes: Hold-to-Charge Abilities (Ember’s Fireball, Zephyr’s Tail Wind, etc) no longer auto cast when full. Cast now occurs on Charge release.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.8.0

patchlogs.name: Update 17.7

name: Excalibur Prime
description: Excalibur Prime is the epitome of mobility and offense, and features the same abilities as Excalibur, but has unique mod polarities installed allowing for greater customization.

abilities.name: Exalted Blade
abilities.description: Summon a sword of pure light and immense power.

abilities.name: Radial Blind
abilities.description: Emits a bright flash of light, blinding all enemies in a small radius for several seconds.

abilities.name: Radial Javelin
abilities.description: Launches javelins towards enemies, dealing high damage and impaling them to walls.

abilities.name: Slash Dash
abilities.description: Dash between enemies while slashing with the Exalted Blade.

name: Frost Prime
description: Frost Prime has the same chilling abilities as Frost but provides unique mod polarities, allowing for greater customization.

abilities.name: Avalanche
abilities.description: Summons a treacherous landslide of ice that instantly freezes and shatters all enemies in its radius.

abilities.name: Freeze
abilities.description: A frigid energy blast that freezes targets in their tracks.

abilities.name: Ice Wave
abilities.description: Sends a wave of razor sharp, crystalized ice toward an enemy, dealing heavy damage.

abilities.name: Snow Globe
abilities.description: Frost deep freezes any vapor and moisture in the area, creating a protective sphere with brief invulnerability to boost its strength.

patchlogs.name: Update: Specters of the Rail
patchlogs.changes: Abilities that exist independent of their creator will not be deactivated if the Warframe enters a nullifier, but will be destroyed if touched by the bubble itself. For example, Frost’s Snowglobe will not disappear when Frost enters the bubble, but will be destroyed if the bubble comes into contact with the Snowglobe sphere.Changes:

name: Hydroid Prime

abilities.description: Target an area and call down a barrage of liquid fury. Charge this attack to increase the lethality of the onslaught.

abilities.description: Tap to spawn watery tentacles from all nearby surfaces to wreak havoc. Charge to increase the number of tentacles and spawn area. Use while in Undertow to have the tentacles emerge from the pool.

abilities.description: Crash through enemies in a ferocious wall of water.

abilities.name: Undertow
abilities.description: Become a water trap and drown unsuspecting enemies.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.0.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue causing Hydroid’s Pilfering Swarm Mod to prevent Defense or Excavation Waves from ending.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.8.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Hydroid Noggle missing his dangly pants.

patchlogs.name: Update 17: Echoes Of The Sentient
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Hydroid’s Undertow not being affected by duration or range Mods.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.5.6
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Hydroid’s Tempest Barrage not properly scaling in damage with rank.

patchlogs.name: Warframe: Sanctuary
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed opening the menu while using Hydroid’s Undertow causing the menu to appear in the wrong location.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.13

patchlogs.name: Mesa Update
patchlogs.changes: Healing speed from Hydroid’s Curative Undertow Mod slowed. Also increased energy consumption from 2 to 5
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed enemy bodies becoming invisible after dying inside of Hydroid’s Undertow.

patchlogs.name: Update 14: The Mad Cephalon
patchlogs.changes: Tweaked the duration and fade on multiple Hydroid ability sound effects.

patchlogs.name: Update 13.1.0: Amprex
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue with Hydroid Undertow remaining in game for other players if a client disconnects while the ability is in use.

name: Loki Prime
description: Confuse, deceive and destroy with Loki Prime. Featuring altered mod polarities for greater customization.

abilities.name: Decoy
abilities.description: Loki deploys a holographic copy of himself, drawing enemy fire.

abilities.name: Invisibility
abilities.description: Loki camouflages himself, becoming invisible to enemies.

abilities.name: Radial Disarm
abilities.description: Lets forth a wave of energy, disrupting the projectile weapons of enemies in range and forcing them to revert to melee combat.

abilities.name: Switch Teleport
abilities.description: Loki instantaneously swaps positions with a target, confusing the enemy.

patchlogs.name: Beasts of the Sanctuary: Hotfix 22.18.8
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Loki Prime Glyphs description being unlocalized.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Update 22.12.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Asita Rakta Syandana clipping into Loki Primes back when equipped.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.11.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed script error causing permanent Invisibility for Loki if the Invisibility expires while using Operator.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.10.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Loki Decoy kills counting towards your score in Conclave.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.2.5
patchlogs.changes: Tweaked the appearance of the Operator’s Void Mode to differentiate it from Loki’s Invisibility. This also applies to Unairu’s Void Shadow so you can identify that the cloak is from the Operator.

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Hotfix 21.1.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed enemies affected by Nyx’s Chaos, Loki’s Radial Disarm, Naramon Mind Spike as well as Radiation procs not taking increased damage from faction damage Mods.

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Hotfix 21.0.7

patchlogs.name: Update 21: Chains of Harrow
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Repala Syandana clipping through Loki’s arms.

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Hotfix 20.0.7
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Loki’s Radial Disarm not properly affecting Sentients in the Octavia’s Anthem quest.

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Update 20
patchlogs.changes: Loki's Radial Disarm damage increased and split 60% Impact and 40% Energy Drain in Conclave.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.11.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Arcturus Syandana floating when equipped on Loki Prime with a Default Loki Skin.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.5.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a script error caused by Loki’s Switch Teleport ability.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 19.0.3
patchlogs.changes: Fixed Loki's Invisibility visual effects appearing as a bubble rather than a silhouette of Loki.

patchlogs.name: Update 19: The War Within
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed being able to collect an infinite amount of Energy Orbs even when Max Energy has been reached with Loki/Nova Prime and a maxed rank Primed Flow equipped as per: https://forums.warframe.com/topic/700300-consuming-energy-orbs-even-with-full-energy/

patchlogs.name: Recurring Nightmares
patchlogs.changes: Adjusted positioning of the Pyra Prime Syandana for Loki Prime and on Saryn Orphid skin.

patchlogs.name: The Index Preview
patchlogs.changes: Optimized Loki’s Radial Disarm and Irradiating Disarm Augment Mod to smooth out frame-rate issues.

patchlogs.name: The Vacuum Within
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed being able keep the hijack buttons in The Law of Retribution pressed indefinitely using Loki's Decoy and then re-casting somewhere else.

patchlogs.name: The Silver Grove
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Loki’s Disarm not working for Junction Specters against players.

patchlogs.name: Specters of the Rail: U2.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a crackling noise when firing the Latron Wraith while using Loki’s Invisibility or Ivara’s Prowl.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.4.7
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Loki’s Knave Skin not having the proper offset for thrown weapons.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.4.6
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Limbo’s Rift visual FX that display on a target improperly displaying on a stealthed Loki.

patchlogs.name: Update 18.3
patchlogs.changes: Fixed ‘On Kill’ conditions on Conclave Mods triggering from destroying Loki’s Decoy.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.0.8
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Loki’s Decoy spawning as hostile to Loki, with the intent to kill its creator in Conclave.

patchlogs.name: Update 18: The Second Dream
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a hitch that would occur with Loki's Radial Disarm - it now does most of the 'Disarming & Reaction across a few frames.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.12.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed some instances where Loki could exit terrain via switch teleport.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.8.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed players becoming staggered when being released from a friendly Loki’s Switch Teleport.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.6.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed headshots / kill FX not properly displaying when slain by Loki during Invisibility, or during cabin depressurization.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.4.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Loki and Ash being unable to damage themselves with explosive weapons while invisible.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.3.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Loki’s Switch Teleport being able to pull players in Archwing out of water.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.2.4
patchlogs.changes: Loki's Radial Disarm now knocks enemies off emplacements when cast instead of destroying them.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.0.3

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.5.6
patchlogs.changes: Loki’s Invisibility, when used with a Sentinel, will now give the Sentinel its proper energy color.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.5.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Loki’s Invisibility not being affected by energy colors as per: https://forums.warframe.com/index.php?/topic/457479-lokis-invisibility-doesnt-get-affected-to-your-energy-colors-and-others/

patchlogs.name: Update 16.3: The New Protocols
patchlogs.changes: Fixed issue that would cause Loki’s Invisibility texture to fill the entire screen as per: https://forums.warframe.com/index.php?/topic/435669-loki-invisibility-texture-filling-entire-screen-glitch/

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.0.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Loki’s Invisibility creating particle effects for every equipped attachment.

patchlogs.name: Warframe: Sanctuary
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Loki`s switch teleport being able to get him stuck into the wall.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 14.10.3

patchlogs.name: Update 14.8.0: Nyx Prime
patchlogs.changes: Added in missing idle animations for Loki, Mirage, and Nova (noble). When inactive for a few seconds, each of these frames will now have idles!

patchlogs.name: Update 14: The Mad Cephalon
patchlogs.changes: Loki's Decoy ability deploy sound effect is now positional and will not be heard by players past a certain distance.

patchlogs.name: Update 10.5.0: The Gradivus Dilemma
patchlogs.changes: Fixed issue where destroying a Loki Decoy or Saryn Moult avatar would award players a kill in Conclave duels.

patchlogs.name: Update 10.3.0: Hump Day!
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Loki’s Radial Disarm that was removing limbs from Infested Runners.

name: Mag Prime
description: The exquisite Mag Prime offers the same abilities as Mag but with unique mod polarities for greater customization.

abilities.name: Crush
abilities.description: Magnetizes the bones of nearby enemies, causing them to collapse upon themselves.

abilities.name: Magnetize
abilities.description: Creates a magnetic field around a target, ensnaring nearby enemies and dealing damage over time. The field reacts to bullets and shards created from Polarize to increase the damage.

abilities.name: Polarize
abilities.description: Emit an energy pulse that depletes enemy shields and armor, creating shards which become deadly when mixed with Magnetize. Shields of allies touched by the pulse are restored.

abilities.name: Pull
abilities.description: Magnetic force pulls enemies toward you, stunning them and bringing them into melee range.

patchlogs.name: Beasts of the Sanctuary: Update 22.19.0
patchlogs.fixes: Reduced the casting speed of Mag’s Crush in Conclave.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Hotfix 22.15.1
patchlogs.changes: Removed an un-advertised Duration from Magus Replenish - the healing on the Operator will now be instantaneous according to the % in the description of the Arcane.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Hotfix 22.14.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed being able to equip a single Magus into both Arcane slots on your Operator. You must own more than one copy of the Magus in order to do so.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Update 22.13.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixes Natural Talent causing a delay after the Mag Crush animation ends where you couldn't cast other Abilities.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Update 22.12.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed primary weapon displaying wrong Magazine/Ammo pool when it is out of Ammo and is switched to from dual wielding.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.10.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed issues with equipping the Maggor Leg Guards on incorrect legs.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.3.4
patchlogs.changes: Reduced the Magus Elevate from 2300 to 230 Oxium per craft.*We Are Running A Script To Refund The Above Differences To As Many People As Possible, But We Only Have 30 Days Of History (Since October 17). Apologies To Those Missed But We'Re Confident We'Ll Get As Many People As Possible. This Script Digs Back Through Time Quite A Bit, And We Expect It To Run Over Night And For Refunds To Be Given Tomorrow (November 17).

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.2.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Nidus’ Maggots not latching onto enemies.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.2.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed leg Armor being incorrectly orientated on Mag’s Pneuma Skin.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.0.8
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Unairu’s Magnetic Blast not dissipating on enemy death.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.0.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Magnetic water in the Plains affecting Limbo while in the Rift.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.0.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Mag Pneuma Helmet being free for everyone.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.0.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a script error when casting Mag’s Polarize.

patchlogs.name: Warframe Update 22: Plains of Eidolon

patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Zakti projectiles not hitting enemies in Mag’s Magnetize field.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.10.1+19.10.1.1

patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a script error when casting Mag’s Magnetize.

patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Mag’s Noble and Agile animation stance breaking when equipping dual pistols.

patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Mag's Polarize shrapnel limit not being applied correctly (would sometimes give you one less than the intended limit).

patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a crash when Infested Maggots would attempt to attach to each other.

patchlogs.name: The Silver Grove
patchlogs.changes: Infested Maggots will now only attach to targets after a jump if they are still in range (possible for target to move out of latch range between jump animation start/end)

patchlogs.name: Specters of the Rail: Update 2
patchlogs.changes: Increased Kela De Thaym’s resistance to health drain to give her a fighting chance against abilities like Trinity’s Energy Vampire, Mag’s Polarize, and Inaros’ Desiccation.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.4.5
patchlogs.changes: As a result of adding 2 more shots per Magazine, reload time for a full reload has slightly increased.

patchlogs.name: Update 18.4.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an error causing Grineer Ramparts to ignore projectile attracting abilities such as Mag’s Bullet Attractor and Zephyr’s Turbulence as per: https://forums.warframe.com/index.php?/topic/577331-rampart-projectiles-not-affected-by-turbulence/

patchlogs.name: Update 18.3
patchlogs.changes: Fixed a bug preventing Mag’s Bullet Attractor Ability from pulling in projectiles as per:  https://forums.warframe.com/index.php?/topic/568459-u18-bug-report-megathread/page-34#entry6612761

patchlogs.name: Update 17.9.0
patchlogs.changes: Eject Magazine / Tactical Reload / Lock and Load (Pistol/Rifle/Shotgun) - weapons reload while holstered.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.7
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Kubrows displaying a Magazine stat in the Arsenal.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.5.5
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Mag’s Bullet Attractor becoming visually frozen as per: https://forums.warframe.com/index.php?/topic/538503-frost-iceglobe-graphical-issue/

patchlogs.name: Update 17.4.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Heartseeker Mod not properly interacting with the Martial Magnetism Mod.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.3.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an improper visual effect on Mag’s Shield Polarize.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.2.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Stug having no Magazine stat in the Arsenal.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.0.4
patchlogs.changes: Mag’s Greedy Pull Augment Mod will no longer pull Syndicate Medallions.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.11: Ash Prime + Hotfix 16.11.1

patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Mag’s Shield Polarize not properly reflecting her custom energy color when used on enemies.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.5.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Mag’s Shield Polarize wiping any overshields you had regardless of having Mag’s Shield Transference Augment Mod or not as per: https://forums.warframe.com/index.php?/topic/456684-has-mag-been-nerfed-or-is-it-just-a-bug/

patchlogs.name: Update 16.3: The New Protocols
patchlogs.changes: Fixed the Martial Magnetism Mod not functioning properly.

patchlogs.changes: Fixed projectiles affected by Mag’s Bullet Attractor not doing any damage.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.12.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Mag’s Greedy Pull Augment not properly using its full range for other clients when relocating items.

patchlogs.changes: Slightly lowered the speed in which Mag’s Pull Ability will drag enemies and items towards you.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Mag’s Greedy Pull Augment not picking up items within range on client, due to host registering items as being further away.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.10.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Mag’s Greedy Pull Mod picking up items at only half the range it should be as per: https://forums.warframe.com/index.php?/topic/346046-greedy-pull-bug/

patchlogs.name: Update 15.7.0 Nova Prime
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Mag’s Shield Transference Augment Mod not properly rotating with Mag as per: https://forums.warframe.com/index.php?/topic/366159-shield-transferences-shield-does-not-respect-warframe-rotation/

patchlogs.name: Update 15.6.0
patchlogs.changes: Saryn’s Molt now removes Brood Mother Maggots, Nanite Swarms, Seeker Latchers and Leeches.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.5.7+15.5.7.1
patchlogs.changes: Increased Magazine Size from 50 to 75

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.5.6
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Infested Maggots latching on to invisible targets, or targets that are too far away from their leap.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.5.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Infested Brood Mother Maggots not detaching from Limbo once he enters the Rift.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.1.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Mag's Bullet Attractor killing player sentinels as per this thread https://forums.warframe.com/index.php?/topic/254993-bullet-attractor-kills-sentinels-last-tested-nov-3

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 14.0.5
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue where weapons that had a max ammo override would not be affected by ammo max mods, like the AkZani not being affected by Trick Mag.

patchlogs.name: Update 14: The Mad Cephalon
patchlogs.changes: Improved the visuals on Mag's Pull ability.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 13.1.2

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 10.5.3
patchlogs.changes: Fixed Grineer Rollers becoming invincible when affected by Mag's Pull ablility

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 10.5.2
patchlogs.changes: Fixed missing Mag Prime component blueprint icons.

patchlogs.name: Update 10.3.0: Hump Day!
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Mag’s Shield Polarize ability FX on enemies to use correct color.

patchlogs.name: Update 9.8
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed AI affected by Mag’s Bullet Attractor ability from shooting once then stopping for several seconds.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 8.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed multiple issues with Mag Bullet Attractor ability (FX on host/client, unintended projectile weapon behaviour, Glaive was not working with this ability).

name: Mirage Prime
description: Dazzle the opposition with this golden master of illusion and mayhem. Featuring altered mod polarities allow for greater customization.

abilities.name: Eclipse
abilities.description: Standing in light, Mirage deals heavy damage, while the shadows make Mirage difficult to track and even harder to hurt.

abilities.name: Hall Of Mirrors
abilities.description: Mirage creates an entourage of doppelgangers to confuse and distract the enemy.

abilities.name: Prism
abilities.description: Fires an energy prism that shoots lasers in all directions. Activating again detonates the prism, blinding nearby foes.

abilities.name: Sleight Of Hand
abilities.description: Booby trap nearby objects while conjuring an irresistible jewel that bursts with radial blind when touched in darkness, or a radial explosion in light. Conjure multiple smaller jewels with the help of Hall of Mirrors.

patchlogs.name: Beasts of the Sanctuary: Hotfix 22.18.5

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Hotfix 22.17.4

patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a script error relating to Mirage.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Update 19.7.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fix the AoE from Nightwatch Napalm Mod doing self-damage when fired during Mirage’s Hall of Mirrors as per:

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.6.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a script error with Mirage’s Prism.

patchlogs.name: The War Within: 19.1.0 Ash Revisited
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Mirage’s Hall of Mirror clones applying her Aura as well.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 19.0.3
patchlogs.changes: Fixed Mirage's Clones applying Auras 4x, one for each clone. * just added on 15/11, missed in original notes.

patchlogs.name: The Index Preview
patchlogs.changes: Optimized frame-time spikes when Mirage Prism' bursts.

patchlogs.name: The Vacuum Within: Hotfix #3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Mirage’s clones throwing invisible Glaives.

patchlogs.name: Specters of the Rail: Hotfix 1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a crash that could occur if a non-replicated avatar (ie. Mirage Clone) was affected by a friendly buff.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.10.4 Operation Rathuum.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed other players getting damaged by projectiles (i.e Ogris)  after Mirage’s Hall of Mirrors expires.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.2.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Mirage’s clones dealing damage from Bullet Jumps in Conclave.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.0.8
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Mirage’s clones staying slumped down and inactive after using a Focus Ability during Hall of Mirrors.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.0.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed players getting damaged by illusions summoned by Mirage’s Hall of Mirrors in Conclave.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.6.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Mirage’s clones having an incorrect fire spread when using the Phage as per: https://forums.warframe.com/index.php?/topic/536814-mirage-hom-phage-resets-when-switching-between-clones/

patchlogs.name: Update 17.4.5
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Simulor creating too many explosions when used with Mirage’s Hall of Mirrors and fire rate Mods.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.4.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed some lingering visual FX from Atomos/Amprex when used with Mirage’s Hall of Mirrors as per: https://forums.warframe.com/index.php?/topic/518981-atomos-beam-glitch-with-mirage-hom/

patchlogs.name: Update 17.3.0
patchlogs.changes: Mirage’s clones produced from Hall of Mirrors will now display a smaller explosion when using the Concealed Explosives Mod to help improve performance.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.2.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue with Mirage's Hall of Mirrors clones not bullet-jumping.

patchlogs.name: Update 17: Echoes Of The Sentient
patchlogs.changes: Clones produced by Mirage’s Hall of Mirrors will no longer show cosmetic items for performance reasons.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed occasional issues in the visual FX of Mirage’s Eclipse.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.10.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed charged beams from the Opticor not aiming properly when fired by Mirage’s clones.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.10.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a visual FX issue that would appear when Mirage used Hall of Mirrors.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.8.0
patchlogs.changes: Mirage’s Hall of Mirror clones will no longer show cosmetic attachments for clients, or if your particle quality is set to low. This change is in an attempt to resolve reports of Performance/crash reports related to Mirage.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Mirage’s Hall of Mirrors causing a crash if you had no customizations on your Warframe or Melee weapon.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.4.3 + Credit Reimbursement #2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Mirage’s Clones being able to hit Mirage with Tonkor shots.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed issue that would occur when using Mirage’s Eclipse that would prevent the player from using this Ability, or other powers, again.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.3: The New Protocols
patchlogs.changes: Fixed visual issue with the Edo Prime Chest Piece when equipped to a Mirage using Eclipse.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.2
patchlogs.changes: Fixed Mirage’s Winter Skin disappearing when Eclipse is activated.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.16 + Tactical Alert!
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed enemies aiming at Hall of Mirrors aiming behind themselves, instead of at Mirage’s image.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.13
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Mirage’s HUD Eclipse Buff showing as going above 255% damage as per: https://forums.warframe.com/index.php?/topic/385883-mirages-total-eclipse-bug-after-update-15100/

patchlogs.name: Update 15.11
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed visual effects on Mirage’s Hall of Mirrors clones when using the Panthera.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.10.1
patchlogs.changes: Mirage’s Hall of Malevolence buff will now show as a % damage increase in the UI.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.10.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Mirage’s Prism occasionally not be destroyed at the end of the cast.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.9
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Kohm creating particle effects on Mirage’s clones when particle settings are not set to High in system settings.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.5.9
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed crash that would occur when Mirage used Hall of Mirrors with a Torid equipped as a client.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.1.0+15.1.01
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Mirage’s Hall of Mirrors clones not animating if you are using a different frames Animation Stance.

patchlogs.name: Update 14.10.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue with the Harlequin Mirage Helmet Blueprint incorrectly appearing as the Arcane Scorpion Ash Helmet Blueprint. Please note that we will be re-running a functioning Harlequin Helmet alert at a similar time as the broken one, but with a doubled duration.

patchlogs.name: Update 14.9.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed issues with the Mirage Codex/Quest diorama having the wrong or conflicting Warframe presented.

patchlogs.name: Update 14.8.0: Nyx Prime
patchlogs.changes: Added in missing idle animations for Loki, Mirage, and Nova (noble). When inactive for a few seconds, each of these frames will now have idles!

patchlogs.name: Update 14.7.0: Operation Gate Crash!
patchlogs.changes: Fixed Mirage's Prism not being properly castable by AI.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 14.0.9
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue with the Mirage’s Prism visuals persisting in the game world if the ability was casted repeatedly (spammed).

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 14.0.5
patchlogs.changes: Improved performance on Mirage’s Prism when Particle Quality is set to low.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed cases of Mirage’s Hall of Mirrors Friendly Fire caused by temporary radiation induced faction change.

name: Nekros Prime
description: Death's new master. Featuring altered mod polarities allow for greater customization.

abilities.name: Desecrate
abilities.description: Forces fallen enemies around you to drop additional loot.

abilities.name: Shadows Of The Dead
abilities.description: Summon shadow versions of vanquished enemies to fight alongside you for a short period.

abilities.name: Soul Punch
abilities.description: A blow so powerful, it turns the enemy's very soul into a deadly projectile, damaging all in its path.

abilities.name: Terrify
abilities.description: Cast fear into the hearts of nearby enemies, causing them to run away in terror.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Zephyr Prime 22.16.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Nekros’ Soul Punch projectile not affecting nearby enemies.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Hotfix 22.16.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Nekros’ Shadows of the Dead clones not attacking enemies.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Update 22.16.0
patchlogs.changes: Updated the look of Nekros’ Shadows of the Dead minions to help players better differentiate between them and real enemies.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Update 22.13.0
patchlogs.changes: Ivara’s Prowl will now only steal from each enemy once total, instead of once per Ivara. Our intent is to mirror how Nekros’ Desecrate also functions, considering the recent movement of Sentient Cores to certain Sentient variants. It’s rewarding to be the warmly welcomed Nekros in an Argon Crystal run, and we hope Ivara will now be welcomed equivalently.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.6.0 + Hotfix 22.6.0.1
patchlogs.changes: Removed blue undertone from Nekros Irkalla’s energy wisps.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.2.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Nekros’ Irkalla Binds appearing regardless of having them equipped on Nekros and Nekros Prime.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.2.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Nekros’ Irkalla wrist chains floating away.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.2.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Nekros Prime arm dangle details appearing when equipped on the Nekros Irkalla Skin. As is standard and precedent for all in-house Deluxe Skins, the override of Prime Details is the intent.

patchlogs.name: Warframe Update 22: Plains of Eidolon
patchlogs.changes: Toned down lens flair on Nekros' idle.

patchlogs.name: Oberon Prime: Hotfix 20.6.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Infested Boiler Nekros shadows spawning pods when they die (they are only supposed to spawn them on damage).

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 20.4.5
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue with Scavenger Ospreys summoned by Nekros/manipulated by Nyx/other abilities consuming loot (they ignore it now when ‘under the influence’).

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Update 20
patchlogs.changes: Nekros’ passive is now 6 seconds of +5 Heal On Kill in Conclave (disabled on Health damage).

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.11.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue where Nekros’ Noble Animation would play the Dual Pistol idle variant while holding a Rifle.

patchlogs.name: Update 19: The War Within
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a Law of Retribution progression stopper due to Nekros spawning a Grineer holding a Tritium Bomb as per: https://forums.warframe.com/topic/698100-nekros-shadows-of-the-dead-can-spawn-with-tritium-bomb-for-last-part-of-law-of-retribution-raid/

patchlogs.name: The Vacuum Within: Hotfix #3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Nekros desecrating one piece of a corpse causing the Desecrate timer to be reset for other pieces of the same corpse.

patchlogs.name: The Silver Grove: U4.2
patchlogs.changes: Fixed the holster position of secondary weapons on Nekros & Chroma.

patchlogs.name: The Silver Grove: Update 1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a crash that occurred while using Nekros’ Desecrate.

patchlogs.name: The Silver Grove: Hotfix 4
patchlogs.changes: Nekros Prime parts added to the Warframe Nexus App.

patchlogs.name: The Silver Grove
patchlogs.changes: Decreased Nekros’ Desecrate delay slightly to make it more popcorny.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Duration Mods reducing energy per enemy for Nekros’ Desecrate. Power Efficiency should only affect energy per enemy for Desecrate.

patchlogs.name: Specters of the Rail: U2.2
patchlogs.changes: Changed Nekros’ Shadows of the Dead teleport range to greater than 30 meters from Nekros. To clarify function here, if a Shadow is 30 meters away from you on recast, it will teleport to range. If it is less than 30 meters away, it will heal.

patchlogs.name: Specters of the Rail: U2.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Nekros’ Desecrate pickups not being shot upwards for Clients.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.4.7
patchlogs.changes: Directional damage indicators have been removed for Abilities, weapons or effects that do self-inflicted damage (Focus abilities, Nekros' Despoil, etc).

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.4.1: Operation Shadow Debt.
patchlogs.changes: Kills earned by Nekros' summoned Shadows of the Dead allies will now contribute to future casts of the ability.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.8.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Nekros’ Terrify having no effect on enemies.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.11.5
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Nekros appearing as blurry in his Codex diorama.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.5.2
patchlogs.changes: The Nekros Mortos Syandana and Valkyr Bonds can no longer be Enhanced. This change is due to Nekros and Valkyr having an unfair advantage over other Warframes by having one additional Arcane slot. We're going to be removing Arcanes off these two attachments, and running a script to compensate players so the Enhancements can be used on intended Syandanas. We will notify everyone when this script has started.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.5.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Arrow skins and Nekros & Valkyr’s unique attachments not using the player’s custom colors.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Nekros’ Soul Survivor Augment not properly tracking revives or counting towards revive challenges as per: https://forums.warframe.com/index.php?/topic/443040-nekros-soul-survivor-does-not-count-as-a-revive/

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.3.5
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed kills from Chroma’s Effigy, Nekros’ Shadows of the Dead and the Itzal Archwing’s Fighter Escort not counting towards player stats.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.3.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Nullifier Crewmen not nullifying Chroma’s Effigy or Nekros’ Shadows of the Dead summons.

patchlogs.name: Warframe: Sanctuary
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed inappropriate sound replication occurring when Nekros` Soul Punch hits an enemy.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.9
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Nekros’ Shadows of the Dead Ability not deactivating properly.

patchlogs.name: Mesa Update
patchlogs.changes: Removed the health and shield penalties from Nekros’ Soul Punch Augment Mod

patchlogs.name: Update 14.7.0: Operation Gate Crash!
patchlogs.changes: Fixed an issue with Nekros' Soul Punch not working correctly in PvP matches.

patchlogs.name: Update 14: The Mad Cephalon
patchlogs.changes: Revisited Nekros tinting.

patchlogs.name: Update 11: Valkyr Unleashed
patchlogs.changes: Fixed Nekros Soul Punch ability to ragdoll target NPCs

patchlogs.name: Update 10.3.0: Hump Day!
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed issue where enemy Shield Osprey drones would shield friendly enemies controlled by Nyx or Nekros.

name: Nova Prime
description: Nova Prime wreaks devastation on her enemies using volatile antimatter. Featuring altered mod polarities for greater customization.

abilities.name: Antimatter Drop
abilities.description: Launches a contained particle of antimatter that will detonate upon collision with increased deadliness when targeted by weapons.

abilities.name: Molecular Prime
abilities.description: Primes all enemies in a radius with volatile antimatter.

abilities.name: Null Star
abilities.description: Creates antimatter particles that orbit Nova and seek nearby targets. Each active particle gives +5% damage reduction to Nova's health, stacking up to 90%.

abilities.name: Worm Hole
abilities.description: Creates a wormhole allowing instantaneous travel.

patchlogs.name: Beasts of the Sanctuary: Update 22.20.0
patchlogs.changes: Tweaked the Nova Lamia Skin to better match the Steam Workshop images.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.10.0

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.2.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a script error when casting Nova’s Molecular Prime ability.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.0.9

patchlogs.fixes: Fixed being able to collect an infinite amount of Energy Orbs even when Max Energy has been reached with Loki/Nova Prime and a maxed rank Primed Flow equipped as per: https://forums.warframe.com/topic/700300-consuming-energy-orbs-even-with-full-energy/

patchlogs.name: The Silver Grove: Hotfix 1
patchlogs.changes: *A Script Is In Progress To Reward The Nova Asuri Helmet To Those Who Purchased The Bundle. Script Is Complete!:

patchlogs.name: Specters of the Rail: U2.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Nova Asuri Skin arm effect not matching your Energy color.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix: Lunaro 6
patchlogs.changes: Increased the FX lifespan on Nova’s Molecular Prime as it can last longer than a minute when modded for maximum duration.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.2.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Nova’s abilities being able to kill Alad V during his intro cinematic.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.10.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Nova’s Antimatter Drop not properly showing damage numbers.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.4.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Nova’s Antimatter Absorb Augment Mod not being affected by power range Mods.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.0.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Nova’s Wormhole Ability still persisting when the player enters Archwing mode.

patchlogs.name: Update 17: Echoes Of The Sentient
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed some Radiation damage weapons not properly applying damage to Nova’s Antimatter Drop absorption.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.13
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an early detonation of Nova’s Null Star not removing the ability timer.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.7.2 + 15.7.2.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Nova Prime not appearing in the Codex for all players.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.7.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Nova’s Antimatter Drop being uncontrollable at Rank 1 as per: https://forums.warframe.com/index.php?/topic/367119-nova-prime-antimatter-drop-broken/

patchlogs.name: Mesa Update
patchlogs.changes: Slightly increased the range and damage of Nova’s Neutron Star Mod.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed improper indentation on Nova’s Abilities panel.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.1.0+15.1.01
patchlogs.changes: Altered Nova's Wormhole ability sound effects to now only be audible when in the proper proximity.

patchlogs.name: Update 14.8.0: Nyx Prime
patchlogs.changes: Added in missing idle animations for Loki, Mirage, and Nova (noble). When inactive for a few seconds, each of these frames will now have idles!

patchlogs.name: Update 14.5: Operation Cryotic Front!
patchlogs.changes: Nova Changes:

patchlogs.name: Update 13.3.0: Pack Hunters
patchlogs.changes: Tweaked the ability and energy visuals on numerous Warframes including Rhino, Frost, Nova, Ash, Banshee, Zephyr, Vauban, Volt and Valkyr.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue with Hyrdoid’s tentacles being killable by allied Nova abilities

patchlogs.name: Update 11.3.0
patchlogs.changes: Fixed issues where Nova’s Molecular Prime would cause enemies to dissolve then reappear as ragdolls.

patchlogs.name: Update 10.5.0: The Gradivus Dilemma
patchlogs.changes: Fixed duration of Nova’s Molecular Prime in Conclave duels (lowered to 5 seconds).

patchlogs.fixes: Fixed issue that allowed Nova’s Wormhole ability to teleport through rock walls.

patchlogs.name: Update 9.5: Operation Arid Fear

name: Nyx Prime
description: Infiltrate the minds of your enemies with Nyx Prime. Featuring altered mod polarities for greater customization.

abilities.name: Absorb
abilities.description: Nyx absorbs all incoming damage and channels that collected energy into an explosive radial discharge.

abilities.name: Chaos
abilities.description: With a powerful psychic blast, Nyx causes mass hysteria on the battlefield by confusing all enemies to attack random factions.

abilities.name: Mind Control
abilities.description: Nyx invades the psyche of a target, confusing enemies and making them fight for the Tenno cause.

abilities.name: Psychic Bolts
abilities.description: Nyx launches a cluster of force bolts at enemies, using telekinesis to adjust flight paths and seek nearby targets.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.8.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Igaro Day of the Dead Syandana appearing offset when equipped on Excalibur, Nyx, Nyx Nemesis Skin, or Nyx Prime.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.2.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an ‘Excalinyx’ appearing in the diorama of the Nyx Nemesis Complete Bundle.

patchlogs.name: Warframe Update 22: Plains of Eidolon
patchlogs.changes: Adjusted the Nyx Carnifex Helmet and Skin colors to match original design.

patchlogs.name: Hydroid Prime: Hotfix 21.7.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed casting Nyx’s Absorb or Banshee’s Soundquake when hitting an enemy with a "grappling hook weapon" allowing you to move around.

patchlogs.name: Hydroid Prime: Update 21.7.0
patchlogs.changes: Excalibur Proto and Nyx Nemesis Skins have received the PBR treatment!

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Hotfix 21.1.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed enemies affected by Nyx’s Chaos, Loki’s Radial Disarm, Naramon Mind Spike as well as Radiation procs not taking increased damage from faction damage Mods.

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Hotfix 21.0.8 + 21.0.8.1
patchlogs.changes: The Stalker can no longer apply Nyx's passive to disarm enemies hit with Absorb due to being so powerful it crashed your game. Stalker pls.

patchlogs.name: Update 21: Chains of Harrow
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed ghostly Rampart remaining on an enemy if they exit the Rampart while under Nyx’s Mind Control.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 20.4.5
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue with Scavenger Ospreys summoned by Nekros/manipulated by Nyx/other abilities consuming loot (they ignore it now when ‘under the influence’).

patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Ospreys initiating their Ambulas hacking while being Mind Controlled by Nyx.

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Hotfix 20.0.7
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Mucusk Syandana not sitting properly on Nyx and any of her Skins.

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Update 20
patchlogs.changes: Nyx's Psychic Daggers now only seek target under reticule. If no target is found, they will fire off in a random direction in Conclave.

name: Oberon Prime
description: Protect the balance with this regal forest guardian. Featuring altered mod polarities for greater customization.

abilities.name: Hallowed Ground
abilities.description: Sanctifies the ground before Oberon with righteous fire, inflicting damage to any enemy that stands in the flames.

abilities.name: Reckoning
abilities.description: Quickly lifts enemies into the air and then hurls them down with conviction. Enemies who succumb to this power have a chance to spawn a Health Sphere.

abilities.name: Renewal
abilities.description: Healing waves of energy flow outward from Oberon to his allies, regenerating health over time.

abilities.name: Smite
abilities.description: Focuses deadly energy within a target and then projects it outwards, damaging both the target and surrounding enemies.

name: Rhino Prime
description: Takes Rhino's ground-shaking abilities to the next level with altered mod polarities that offer greater customization.

abilities.name: Iron Skin
abilities.description: Rhino hardens his skin, insulating himself from all damage.

abilities.name: Rhino Charge
abilities.description: Rhino charges towards a target, clobbering any in his path and goring his victim.

abilities.name: Rhino Stomp
abilities.description: Rhino stomps with force sufficient to disrupt time, tumbling enemies around him in stasis.

abilities.name: Roar
abilities.description: Grants all nearby Warframes increased damage for a short duration.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.8.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Rhino’s Roar buff VFX not appearing on the helmets of Client players when viewed by Client players. The host sees the VFX on all parts for all players.

patchlogs.name: Oberon Prime: Hotfix 20.7.1
patchlogs.changes: The Health Conversion Mod now activates upon taking damage instead of getting hit. Previously, Warframes (like Valkyr, Rhino or Nezha) that have abilities that make themselves invincible to damage, were consuming the conversion when hit even though no damage was being done due to invincibility. This rendered the Health Conversion Mod rather useless, and has since been changed to improve functionality.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.10.4 Operation Rathuum.
patchlogs.changes: Tweaked Rhino’s default energy color to be slightly more blue.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.4.12: Saryn Prime
patchlogs.changes: Infested Sorties will no longer generate Hijack Sortie Missions because their tiny baby claws are too small to reach the core.Convergence will always spawn moving towards an objective to help reduce unnecessary backtracking.Gravity has been disabled for Convergence pickups, keeping their appearance predictable..Steel Meridian’s General Sacrifice has been changed from Rhino Prime Helmet to Trinity Prime Helmet.The Rift and its interaction with hacking terminals has now been consistently applied to be not-hackable. You may have noticed the inconsistency in Rifted targets ability to interact with hacking panels. While his Rift-based skillset does offer some unique opportunities for players one major issue discussed within the community has been determining what are the 'rules' Limbo's Riftwalking follows. Keeping this in mind players can expect future updates to contain adjustments to Limbo, enemies, and interactable elements of the environment, to help make playing Limbo a more consistent experience.  We will continue to monitor Limbo's unique interactive mechanic and its effect on gameplay, and will let you know should any other changes be necessary. Stay tuned for a Dev Workshop!

name: Saryn Prime
description: A golden blossom conceals deadly nectar. Featuring altered mod polarities for greater customization.

abilities.name: Miasma
abilities.description: Release a poisonous miasma that deals <DT_VIRAL>Viral damage to enemies in range. Foes afflicted by spores are more susceptible to the mist.

abilities.name: Molt
abilities.description: Shedding her skin like a snake, Saryn leaves a decoy behind to draw fire from enemies.

abilities.name: Spores
abilities.description: Inflict a target with a pox of <DT_CORROSIVE>Corrosive spores. Spread spores to nearby enemies by destroying them or killing their host. The longer the Spore spreads, its damage will increase.

abilities.name: Toxic Lash
abilities.description: While active, attacks deal additional <DT_POISON>Toxin damage; this effect is doubled for melee strikes. Instantly burst spores when attacking afflicted enemies.

name: Trinity Prime
description: Become the bastion that defends allies using powerful healing abilities with Trinity Prime. Featuring altered mod polarities for greater customization.

abilities.description: Restore the health and shields of allies within Trinity's affinity aura while giving them some damage resistance.

name: Valkyr Prime
description: A proud fighter emerges unscarred by time or malice. Featuring altered mod polarities allow for greater customization.

abilities.name: Hysteria
abilities.description: Valkyr is imbued with energy and becomes a ball of vicious rage, capable of unleashing a torrent of deadly claw attacks on unsuspecting foes.

abilities.name: Paralysis
abilities.description: Valkyr unleashes her shields, stunning and damaging enemies around her.

abilities.name: Rip Line
abilities.description: Valkyr hurls forth a hook. If it hits an enemy, she pulls them to her. If it hits terrain, she pulls herself to the hook's location.

abilities.name: Warcry
abilities.description: Valkyr lets out a rallying cry that bolsters her allies melee speed while slowing down nearby enemies.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.10.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Cryona Syandana sitting too high on Valkyr, Valkyr Prime, and Valkyr Gersemi Skin.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.2.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Syandanas not sitting properly on the Valkyr Delusion Skin.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.1.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the material of Valkyr’s Delusion Tennogen Skin incorrectly applying when toggling on the Prime details for Valkyr Prime in the Arsenal.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.0.7
patchlogs.fixes: Improved performance issues when hitting multiple enemies with Valkyr’s Paralysis.

patchlogs.name: Oberon Prime: Hotfix 20.7.1
patchlogs.changes: The Health Conversion Mod now activates upon taking damage instead of getting hit. Previously, Warframes (like Valkyr, Rhino or Nezha) that have abilities that make themselves invincible to damage, were consuming the conversion when hit even though no damage was being done due to invincibility. This rendered the Health Conversion Mod rather useless, and has since been changed to improve functionality.

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Update 20.1.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Valkyr continuing to have her Talons equipped after Hysteria is deactivated if a player was joining the game while the ability was being activated.

patchlogs.name: Update 19.13.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed being able to stack speed buffs exponentially with Dispatch Overdrive and a toggled 4th Warframe ability (Excalibur, Valkyr, etc) .

patchlogs.name: Banshee Prime: Hotfix 19.11.5 + 19.11.6
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed numerous Syandanas not applying properly to the Valkyr Gersemi skin.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Update 19.9.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed using Valkyr's Hysteria/Excalibur's Exalted Blade/Wukong's Primal Fury during a ‘Weapon Only’ Sortie resulting in "Power In Use" when casting any ability for the remainder of the mission.

patchlogs.name: The War Within: 19.1.0 Ash Revisited
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed incorrect use of grammar in Valkyr’s Passive description.

patchlogs.name: Update 19: The War Within
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a script error with Valkyr’s Prolonged Paralysis augment.

patchlogs.name: Recurring Nightmares

patchlogs.name: The Vacuum Within: Hotfix #3

patchlogs.name: The Silver Grove: U1.2 + U1.3

patchlogs.name: Specters of the Rail: U2.3

patchlogs.name: Hotfix: Lunaro 2
patchlogs.fixes: **Please Note: In Update Lunaro We Listed An Incorrect Fix. Valkyr’S Hysteria Was Not Draining Twice The Amount Of Energy, It Was Actually Applying Efficiency Mods Twice. The Fix Should Read As: Fixed Valkyr'S Hysteria Applying Efficiency Mods Twice.:

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.2.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an error allowing Valkyr to pull player out of the extraction area as per: https://forums.warframe.com/index.php?/topic/575698-valkyrs-rip-line-pulls-players-out-of-extraction-area/

patchlogs.name: Update 18.2.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an error that would prevent Clients from being able to use their powers as Valkyr, Wukong, Ivara or Excalibur if meleeing while their 4th Ability Power was ending, or being deactivated due to a Nullifier bubble.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.7

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.6.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Valkyr taking damage from broken windows while in Hysteria.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.6: Trinity Prime
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue causing Clients using Valkyr to still take damage while in Hysteria as per: https://forums.warframe.com/index.php?/topic/539459-hysteria-glitch/

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.5.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Valkyr's Prolonged Paralysis pulling enemies significantly farther than intended.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.5: The Jordas Precept. + Hotfix 17.5.1

patchlogs.name: Update 17.4.5
patchlogs.additions: New Noggles are now available in the Market!  Add Oberon, Valkyr and Zephyr to your collection today!

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.0.5

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.0.1

patchlogs.name: Update 17: Echoes Of The Sentient
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Valkyr’s Warcry stacking multiple times on Squad members when Eternal War Augment is equipped.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.7
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Valkyr’s Hysteria playing sounds from related to the player’s un-equipped melee weapon.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.5.2
patchlogs.changes: The Nekros Mortos Syandana and Valkyr Bonds can no longer be Enhanced. This change is due to Nekros and Valkyr having an unfair advantage over other Warframes by having one additional Arcane slot. We're going to be removing Arcanes off these two attachments, and running a script to compensate players so the Enhancements can be used on intended Syandanas. We will notify everyone when this script has started.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.5.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Arrow skins and Nekros & Valkyr’s unique attachments not using the player’s custom colors.

patchlogs.name: Mesa Update
patchlogs.changes: Updated Valkyr’s Prolonged Paralysis Mod to leave enemies stunned on the ground, open to execution attacks.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.1.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a scaling issue seen with Valkyr’s ambient visual effects during Archwing missions.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 14.10.3
patchlogs.changes: Parry procs can now be triggered during Valkyr’s Hysteria.

name: Vauban Prime
description: Transform the battlefield into a weapon with this gilded tactician. Features unique mod polarities for extended customization.

abilities.name: Bastille

abilities.name: Minelayer
abilities.description: Cycle through four deployable trap mines: Bounce, Trip Laser, Shred and Concuss.

abilities.name: Tesla
abilities.description: Launches a grenade that holds an electrical charge, zapping enemies that come within range.

abilities.name: Vortex
abilities.description: Creates a whirling mass of energy that violently attracts nearby enemies, crushing their atoms into a tiny spec of matter

patchlogs.name: The Pacifism Defect: Hotfix 19.12.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Vauban’s Bastille and Vortex lingering in tiles after players have left said tile.This resulted in enemies continually being damaged or immobile even after the ability ended.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.11.2

patchlogs.name: Update 19: The War Within
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Vauban's passive, Reinforce, not applying after being revived and until a player enters or exits the radius.

patchlogs.name: The Index Preview: Hotfix #2
patchlogs.changes: Excluded Reactant and Index Point pickups from Simulor, Inaros' Sandstorm, Zephyr Tornado, and Vauban's Vortex. This also fixes the exception lists for the Simulor; it wasn't supposed to be moving  gameplay objects (eg Datamass, Excavation Power Cells, Raptor Cells, etc) but it generally wasn't of a problem because the objects were heavy enough (properly excluding them should run faster too!). As more and more gameplay components rely on pickups, we've addressed this issue as it is commonly discussed by you all.

patchlogs.changes: Vauban Changes:

name: Volt Prime
description: A glorious warrior from the past, Volt Prime features the same abilities as Volt but with unique mod polarities for greater customization.

abilities.name: Discharge
abilities.description: Paralyze nearby hostiles with a damaging electric charge, this also shocks approaching enemies.

abilities.name: Electric Shield
abilities.description: Volt deploys an obstacle of energy, providing cover in any situation.

abilities.name: Shock
abilities.description: Launches a shocking projectile. It stuns and deals high damage to a single target and chains damage to nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Speed
abilities.description: Gain a brief boost of movement speed which affects all allies in range.

name: Zephyr Prime
description: Take to the skies with this golden bird of destruction.

abilities.name: Airburst
abilities.description: Generate a burst of massively dense air that explodes on contact and sends enemies flying. Launch Airbursts into Tornadoes to make them grow.

abilities.name: Tail Wind
abilities.description: From the ground, charge and release to launch Zephyr into an airborne hover. From the air, tap to dash forward, or aim down to dive bomb enemies below.

abilities.name: Tornado
abilities.description: Create deadly tornadoes that seek out and engulf enemies. Tornadoes deal the elemental damage type they absorb the most. Shoot enemies engulfed in Tornadoes to do additional damage.

abilities.name: Turbulence
abilities.description: Creates a wind shield around Zephyr, redirecting all incoming projectiles.

patchlogs.name: Beasts of the Sanctuary: Hotfix 22.20.5

patchlogs.name: The Index Preview: Hotfix #2
patchlogs.changes: Excluded Reactant and Index Point pickups from Simulor, Inaros' Sandstorm, Zephyr Tornado, and Vauban's Vortex. This also fixes the exception lists for the Simulor; it wasn't supposed to be moving  gameplay objects (eg Datamass, Excavation Power Cells, Raptor Cells, etc) but it generally wasn't of a problem because the objects were heavy enough (properly excluding them should run faster too!). patchlogs.name: Update 15.13
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Zephyr’s Tornado climbing into the air to chase enemies already being tossed into the air.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.9
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed scale and placement of Targis Prime armor when used on Mesa and Zephyr.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.7.2 + 15.7.2.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed issue with host migration in Archwing Missions where players using Zephyr are no longer able to move.

patchlogs.name: Mesa Update
patchlogs.changes: Reduced pull distance and increased pull force on Zephyr’s Dive Bomb Augment Mod.

patchlogs.name: Warframe: Archwing
patchlogs.changes: Improved physics on Zephyr's helmet in an attempt to lower extreme object movement.

patchlogs.name: Update 14: The Mad Cephalon
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Melee Slamming during Zephyr’s Tail Wind not using Melee weapon if you were in melee equip mode.

patchlogs.name: Update 13.3.0: Pack Hunters
patchlogs.changes: Tweaked the ability and energy visuals on numerous Warframes including Rhino, Frost, Nova, Ash, Banshee, Zephyr, Vauban, Volt and Valkyr.

name: Carrier Prime
description: This ornate sentinel is an excellent example of late Orokin craftsmanship and styling.

patchlogs.name: Oberon Prime: Update 20.7.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed disarming Corpus Power Carriers resulting in their Provas floating outside of their hands.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Update 19.8.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue with Carrier's Ammo Case Mod being exploitable.

patchlogs.name: The Vacuum Within: Hotfix #2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Ammo Case still applying its buffs after Carrier has died.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.4.7
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a potential issue causing pickups to become stuck to the Carrier Sentinel as a Host.

patchlogs.name: Update 18.4.0
patchlogs.changes: Enabled Scavenger Drones, Sapping Ospreys, Leech Ospreys, Mine Ospreys, and Mutalist Osprey Carriers in the Simulacrum.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.6.1
patchlogs.changes: Infested Carrier Drones now have a unique explosion FX.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed projectiles from Infested Carriers in the J-3 Golem fight not properly dealing damage to players.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.3.0
patchlogs.changes: T3S Rotation C: Forma BP for Prime Carrier BP.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.0.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Carrier pulling items towards players while on a Rampart.

patchlogs.name: Update 17: Echoes Of The Sentient
patchlogs.changes: Carrier's Vacuum will no longer pick up items while the player is bleeding out.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.11.5
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue where ammo pickups mutated by Hosts would confuse Clients-side Carriers as per: https://forums.warframe.com/index.php?/topic/480877-carrier-looting-bug-ammo-clicking/

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.11.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Carrier Prime’s Carapace description reading the description for Wyrm Prime.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.11: Ash Prime + Hotfix 16.11.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Ash, Vectis and Carrier parts not dropping for players in the Void.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.9.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Para Carrier skin showing code in its description.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.6.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed items vacuumed in by the Carrier becoming stuck to the Carrier.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.6.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Carrier Sentinels not sucking in Sigils and other item drops.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.5.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Carrier’s Vacuum not picking up Pigments.

patchlogs.name: Warframe: Sanctuary
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Carrier Sentinel dragging items that have not (or cannot) be claimed, following the player forever.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.13
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Stamina orbs in the Dojo becoming vacuumed up by Carrier for eternity.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.9
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Corpus Power Carrier appearing twice in the Codex.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 14.0.9
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Carrier sentinel being seemingly 1 hit killed by enemy Kubrows and Volatile Infested.

patchlogs.name: Update 10.3.0: Hump Day!
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed emblem deco positions on Carrier and Djinn sentinels.

name: Helios Prime
description: This knowledge hungry protector defends its master with Deconstructor Prime.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Hotfix 22.17.4
patchlogs.changes: Optimized Helios' Investigator Precept: it should now find targets more than 10x faster and no longer causes periodic spikes in frame-time as high as 7ms.

patchlogs.name: The Pacifism Defect: Update 19.12.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed being able to equip Deconstructor on a Sentinel that is not Helios.

patchlogs.name: Banshee Prime: Hotfix 19.11.5 + 19.11.6
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a bug where non-Helios Sentinels could equip the Deconstructor when randomizing their loadout.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.0.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Helios being able to scan Oddities.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.0.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Helios being able to scan Oddities.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.5.6
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Helios not attacking enemies when equipped with the Deconstructor.

patchlogs.name: Warframe: Sanctuary
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed issue with Helios caused by viewing another player’s profile then entering a Mission, causing Helios to count scans from other player’s completed Codex.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.5.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed issue with Helios not scanning properly.

patchlogs.name: Warframe: Archwing
patchlogs.fixes: Simplified Helios' scan logic to avoid a bunch of heavy-lifting that is already done by native code.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 13.4.1
patchlogs.changes: Fixed an issue with Helios' incorrectly scanning objects outside of the players aim as well as objects whose Codex entry is already complete. Helio sfix, Codex entries for crates will follow.

patchlogs.name: Update 13.3.0: Pack Hunters
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Helios' Investigator Precept not properly displaying/calculating its max rank and perpetually behaving like a rank 0 mod. It will also receive a target lock so it doesn’t Get distracted during scans so easily.

name: Wyrm Prime
